Export.zv: Cache for UNIX (Red Hat Enterprise Linux for x86-64) 2014.1.3 (Build 775)

Parameter.name: APPLICATIONNAME
Parameter.Description: This is the name of this application.

Parameter.name: HOMEPAGE
Parameter.Description: This is the URL of the main starting page of this application.

XData.name: Style
XData.Description: This Style block contains application-wide CSS style definitions.
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">

/* style for table pane */
#table table {
	width: 900px;
}

/* style for title bar */
    #title {
      background: #C5D6D6;
      color: black;
      font-family: Verdana;
      font-size: 1.5em;
      font-weight: bold;
      padding: 5px;
      border-bottom: 1px solid black;
      text-align: center;
    }

</style>
